languages.text: {n}Маражай прищуривается, на его губах растекается улыбка.{/n} "Мы отправимся туда и получим то, чего хотим. Ты — трофеи и новые игрушки. Я — удовольствие от растаптывания тех, кто отвернулся от меня... власть над своим кабалом. Если мне удастся заставить их склониться передо мной".

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай прищуривается, на его губах растекается улыбка.{/n} "Мы. Мы оба отправимся туда и получим то, чего хотели. Ты — трофеи и новые игрушки. Я — власть над кабалом... или удовольствие от растаптывания моих врагов".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow as a smile spreads across his lips.{/n} "We will go there and get what we want. You will acquire trophies and new playthings, and I will derive pleasure from trampling all over those who turned their backs on me... Power over my Kabal, too, if I manage to make them bow down before me."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай прищуривается, на его губах растекается улыбка.{/n} "Мы отправимся туда и получим то, чего хотим. Ты — трофеи и новые игрушки. Я — удовольствие от растаптывания тех, кто отвернулся от меня... власть над своим кабалом. Если мне удастся заставить их склониться передо мной".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai squints, a smile spreading across his lips.{/n} "We will go there and get what we want. You will get trophies and new playthings, I will get pleasure from trampling all over those who had turned away from me... Power over my Kabal, too, if I manage to make them bow before me."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai squints, a smile spreading across his lips.{/n} "We will go there and get what we want. You will acquire trophies and new playthings, and I will derive pleasure from trampling all over those who turned their backs on me... Power over my Kabal, too, if I manage to make them bow down before me."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Augen verengen sich und ein Lächeln macht sich auf seinen Lippen breit.{/n} "Wir fliegen hin und holen uns, was wir wollen. Ihr bekommt Trophäen und neue Spielsachen, und mir wird es große Freude bereiten, all jene zu überrennen, die mir den Rücken zugekehrt haben ... Und ich bekomme Macht über meine Kabale, wenn ich sie dazu bringe, sich vor mir zu verneigen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow as a smile spreads across his lips.{/n} "We will go there and get what we want. You will acquire trophies and new playthings, and I will derive pleasure from trampling all over those who turned their backs on me... Power over my Kabal, too, if I manage to make them bow down before me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais Augen verengen sich und ein Lächeln macht sich auf seinen Lippen breit.{/n} "Wir fliegen hin und holen uns, was wir wollen. Ihr bekommt Trophäen und neue Spielsachen, und mir wird es große Freude bereiten, all jene zu überrennen, die mir den Rücken zugekehrt haben ... Und ich bekomme Macht über meine Kabale, wenn ich sie dazu bringe, sich vor mir zu verneigen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋眯起眼睛，嘴角绽开微笑。{/n}“我们要去那里，得到我们想要的东西。你会获得战利品和新的玩具，而我会碾碎那些背弃我的人，从中获得乐趣……同时掌控我的阴谋团，假设我能让他们臣服于我的话。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow as a smile spreads across his lips.{/n} "We will go there and get what we want. You will acquire trophies and new playthings, and I will derive pleasure from trampling all over those who turned their backs on me... Power over my Kabal, too, if I manage to make them bow down before me."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋眯起眼睛，嘴角绽开微笑。{/n}“我们要去那里，得到我们想要的东西。你会获得战利品和新的玩具，而我会碾碎那些背弃我的人，从中获得乐趣……同时掌控我的阴谋团，假设我能让他们臣服于我的话。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les yeux de Marazhai se plissent tandis que son sourire s'élargit.{/n} « Nous nous rendrons sur place et nous prendrons ce que bon nous semble. Vous, vous obtiendrez des trophées et de nouveaux esclaves, et moi, je me délecterai en piétinant tous ceux qui m'ont tourné le dos... Je prendrai aussi le contrôle de ma Kabale, si je parviens à leur faire plier le genou. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow as a smile spreads across his lips.{/n} "We will go there and get what we want. You will acquire trophies and new playthings, and I will derive pleasure from trampling all over those who turned their backs on me... Power over my Kabal, too, if I manage to make them bow down before me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux de Marazhai se plissent tandis que son sourire s'élargit.{/n} « Nous nous rendrons sur place et nous prendrons ce que bon nous semble. Vous, vous obtiendrez des trophées et de nouveaux esclaves, et moi, je me délecterai en piétinant tous ceux qui m'ont tourné le dos... Je prendrai aussi le contrôle de ma Kabale, si je parviens à leur faire plier le genou. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra los ojos y sonríe ampliamente.{/n} «Iremos y nos llevaremos lo que queramos. Tú obtendrás más trofeos y juguetes y yo disfrutaré del placer de pisotear a todos los que me han dado la espalda... y recuperaré el poder de mi Kábala, si logro doblegarla».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow as a smile spreads across his lips.{/n} "We will go there and get what we want. You will acquire trophies and new playthings, and I will derive pleasure from trampling all over those who turned their backs on me... Power over my Kabal, too, if I manage to make them bow down before me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra los ojos y sonríe ampliamente.{/n} «Iremos y nos llevaremos lo que queramos. Tú obtendrás más trofeos y juguetes y yo disfrutaré del placer de pisotear a todos los que me han dado la espalda... y recuperaré el poder de mi Kábala, si logro doblegarla».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}唇に笑みがひろがるにあわせ、マラズハイの目が細くなる。{/n}「そこに行って俺たちの望むものを手に入れる。お前は戦利品と新しいおもちゃを手に入れ、俺様は自分に背を向けた奴らを踏み潰すことで極上の喜びを手にいれる…そして奴らを俺の前でひざまずかせることができたなら、我が陰謀団における権力も手に入る」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow as a smile spreads across his lips.{/n} "We will go there and get what we want. You will acquire trophies and new playthings, and I will derive pleasure from trampling all over those who turned their backs on me... Power over my Kabal, too, if I manage to make them bow down before me."

traits.locale_text: {n}唇に笑みがひろがるにあわせ、マラズハイの目が細くなる。{/n}「そこに行って俺たちの望むものを手に入れる。お前は戦利品と新しいおもちゃを手に入れ、俺様は自分に背を向けた奴らを踏み潰すことで極上の喜びを手にいれる…そして奴らを俺の前でひざまずかせることができたなら、我が陰謀団における権力も手に入る」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Dudakları kıvrılıp bir gülümseme meydana getiren Marazhai'ın gözleri kısılıyor.{/n} "Oraya gideceğiz ve ne istersek alacağız. Sen ganimet ve yeni oyuncaklar alacaksın, bense bana sırtını dönen herkesi ayaklarımın altına almanın zevkine varacağım. Boyun eğdirtmeyi başarırsam Kabal da kontrolüme girecek."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow as a smile spreads across his lips.{/n} "We will go there and get what we want. You will acquire trophies and new playthings, and I will derive pleasure from trampling all over those who turned their backs on me... Power over my Kabal, too, if I manage to make them bow down before me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dudakları kıvrılıp bir gülüş meydana getiren Marazhai'ın gözleri kısılıyor.{/n} "Oraya gideceğiz ve ne istersek alacağız. Sen ganimet ve yeni oyuncaklar alacaksın, ben ise bana sırtını dönen herkesi ayaklarımın altına almanın zevkine varacağım. Boyun eğdirtmeyi başarırsam Kabalımı da gücüm altına alacağım."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
